title: What’s the real “winner” this Grammys 2020 Awards? - Quora

It was Billie Eilish’s night, winning Record and Song is the Year for “Bad Guy”, Album of the Year for “When We Fall Asleep, Where Do We Go?”, and Beat New Artist. That has only occurred once in Grammy history - in 1981, Christopher Cross achieved the same feat. He remains the only artist to take the vocal award - at the time it was gender specific - as well. Eilish missed on the vocal honors, which went to Lizzo, who entered the night with the most nominations (8 nods). It was a humble Eilish who was overwhelmed by the final award that she ended the night with a simple “thank you”.
